csw:Record.dc:title: North Sea - Temperature and salinity observation collection V2
csw:Record.dc:subject: Oceanographic geographical features
Temperature of the water column
Salinity of the water column
ITS-90 water temperature
Water body salinity
North Sea
oceans
csw:Record.dct:abstract:
SeaDataNet Temperature and Salinity historical data collection for the North Sea contains all open access temperature and salinity in situ data retrieved from SeaDataNet infrastructure at the end of 2014. The data span between -4°W and 10°E in longitude, and from 49°N to 62°N in latitude. It covers the time period 1900-2014. Data have been quality checked using ODV software. Quality Flags of anomalous data have been revised using basic QC procedures.
The dataset is available on authenticated FTP as zip files. You can get access codes from : http://www.marine-id.org. The dataset format is ODV binary collections. You can read, analyse and export from the ODV application provided by Alfred Wegener institute at http://odv.awi.de/

csw:Record.dc:source: The data used as input for this product have been extracted from the SeadataNet Download Service: http://www.seadatanet.org/Data-Access/Common-Data-Index-CDI
